issues.description: The problem statement specifies that the orders attribute should be a modifiable List<Meal>, but both the template approach (using ArrayHelpers with arrays) and the reference solution implement orders as a Meal[] array. This mismatch between List<Meal> in the spec and Meal[] in code may confuse students about which collection type to use.
issues.suggested_fix: Align the specification and code by either changing the problem statement to require an array-based orders attribute (e.g., Meal[] orders) or updating template and solution to use List<Meal> (e.g., List<Meal> orders with ArrayList).
